Mr. Greenfield assigns Anna to take care of his two grandkids. The grandkids are named Jocelyn and Jocelyn. They are mischievous and always get into trouble.

Anna has never taken care of children before, so she is both nervous and excited about the prospect of taking care of these two mischievous grandkids.

As Anna takes care of Jocelyn and Jocelyn, they come up with a series of fun and silly games that they can play together to keep themselves entertained and occupied.
